Class AdaptativeJsonHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.waarp.common.json.AdaptativeJsonHandler

public class AdaptativeJsonHandler
extends Object

JSON handler using adaptative format (Smile or Json - in that order -)

Author:
"Frederic Bregier"
